name: eidy storycraft
description:
Eidy is a virtual world that lets players make things using words and numbers. It is the first open world educational game that allows complete freedom of movement and learning using behaviorist learning principles.

Eidy was originally an entry for the XPRIZE for Global Learning, and is currently in development as a cross-platform educational title.

The game will eventually be released on the Android Play Store as well as Windows.

Feedback is welcome.
